ISP203A.name: Understanding Earth: Global Change
ISP203A.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP203A.description: Science as a way of knowing about natural and anthropogenic global change. Implications for societies.
ISP203A.prerequisite: (MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)) or designated score on Mathematics Placement test

ISP203B.name: Understanding Earth: Natural Hazards and the Environment
ISP203B.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP203B.description: Science as a way of knowing about natural hazards, as well as natural and anthropogenic environmental change. Implications for societies.
ISP203B.prerequisite: (MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)) or designated score on Mathematics Placement test

ISP203L.name: Geology of the Human Environment Laboratory
ISP203L.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP203L.description: Exercises in the scientific method applied to earth materials and their impact on society.

ISP205.name: Visions of the Universe
ISP205.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP205.description: Role of observation, theory, philosophy, and technology in the development of the modern conception of the universe. The Copernican Revolution. Birth and death of stars. Spaceship Earth. Cosmology and time.
ISP205.prerequisite: (MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)) or designated score on Mathematics Placement test

ISP205L.name: Visions of the Universe Laboratory
ISP205L.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP205L.description: Observations of the sky, laboratory experiments, and computer simulations exploring the development of the modern conception of the universe.

ISP209.name: The Mystery of the Physical World
ISP209.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP209.description: Laws of physics through demonstrations and analyses of every day phenomena. Optics, mechanical systems and electromagnetic phenomena.
ISP209.prerequisite: (MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)) or designated score on Mathematics Placement test

ISP209L.name: The Mystery of the Physical World Laboratory
ISP209L.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year

ISP215.name: The Science of Sound
ISP215.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ISP215.description: The science of speech, communication, musical instruments, room acoustics, and analogue and digital audio. Integrating the physical, physiological, and psychological principles involved.
ISP215.prerequisite: (MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)) or designated score on Mathematics Placement test

ISP217.name: Water and the Environment
ISP217.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ISP217.description: Application of the scientific method to identification and solution of environmental problems related to water.
ISP217.prerequisite: MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)

ISP217L.name: Water and the Environment Lab
ISP217L.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year
ISP217L.description: Application of the scientific method to identification and solution of environmental problems related to water.

ISP220.name: Quarks, Spacetime, and the Big Bang
ISP220.description: Elementary particle physics and the Big Bang for non-scientists. A survey of particles and forces in the early universe as it is recreated at high energy particle colliders in laboratories around the world.
ISP220.prerequisite: (MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)) or designated score on Mathematics Placement test

ISP221.name: Earth Environment and Energy
ISP221.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
ISP221.description: Flow of energy into, through, and out of the earth's lithosphere, hydrosphere, atmosphere, and biosphere. Energy, entropy, and life processes. Global warming, greenhouse effect, and contemporary issues.
ISP221.prerequisite: MTH 101 or MTH 103 or MTH 103B or (MTH 116 or concurrently) or (MTH 124 or concurrently) or (MTH 132 or concurrently) or (MTH 201 or concurrently) or (LB 118 or concurrently) or (STT 200 or concurrently) or (STT 201 or concurrently)
